title: Been lagging a lot lately?
body: Does anyone know how to fix the lagging problems thats been in the game lately? Its been like this for a while now. But now it jumps up to 4000 ms.

replies.body:
High latency is often the result of problematic local configurations or ISP routing issues. We can definitely take a look at your routing, but first, we need to ensure your settings local to your network are good with the steps in our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused your latency to change at all.
